We offer symfony2 developement services with a strong focus on code quality and internal design. This allows us to effectively handle large long-term projects without accumulating architectural debts that slows down product evolution.Â 

Order and clarity are important to get a quality product. We use Agile practices allowing us to control the project workflow and code quality. Test-driven development and object-oriented design are the core concepts we use in our work. The main tool helping us transfer these concepts into the perfect code is Symfony2 framework.
We are offering outstaffing service (our programmers become a part of your team) by giving you direct contacts to assigned developers, so for you there should be no difference comparing to dealing with individual contractors in this aspect. However the fact that developers are a part of a big team has many benefits for you:
overall high level of technical experience with sf2 framework, which is our corporate standard for developing web-applications starting from the small-scale ones to large enterprise systems
team extension (if needed later) keeping all the developers at one site
high level of English for all the team members
reliable work schedule & better productivity because developers are working from office and not from home
dedicated part-time project manager who is responsible for any kind of organizational/billing issues
